# DeviceActivityResults

**Structure**

An asynchronous sequence of filtered device activity results.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DeviceActivityResults<Element>
```

## Classes

- **DeviceActivityResults.Iterator**: An asynchronous iterator for filtered device activity.

## Instance Methods

- **makeAsyncIterator()**: Creates the asynchronous iterator that produces elements of this asynchronous sequence.

## Conforms To

- AsyncSequence
